title: Baby Leek and Mushroom Quinoa
ingredients: ['4 tbsp mixed seeds, such as pumpkin and sunflower seeds', '25g unsalted butter', '150g baby leeks, sliced on the diagonal in 2cm lengths', '175g baby button mushrooms', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '225g quinoa, rinsed', '750ml well-flavoured vegetable stock, made with stock cubes', '1/2 tsp dried mixed herbs', 'grated zest and juice of 1 small lemon', '3 tbsp chopped fresh parsley']
